items.headline: Ford is readying a ‘compelling EV.’ Will that be enough for the stock?
items.summary_en: Ford plans to offer a new four-door, midsize $30,000 electric pickup truck two years from now. The new EV is to be built on a new, universal EV platform, which Ford says is expected to reduce parts by 20% and assembly time by 15%.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Intel’s CEO seems to have made nice with Trump. What comes next?
items.summary_en: The chip maker could ask for more monetary support and for the White House to encourage customers to use its advanced chips, Bernstein analysts said.

items.headline: CoreWeave’s mixed earnings fail to wow AI bulls, and the stock falls

items.headline: Cava trims sales outlook, stock tumbles as CEO says consumers are navigating a ‘fog’
items.summary_en: Shares of Cava Group tumbled late Tuesday after the Mediterranean fast-casual restaurant chain trimmed its full-year same-store sales outlook.

items.headline: These Eli Lilly executives have been scooping up stock after its big drop
items.summary_en: Eli Lilly’s weight-loss pill disappointed in a key trial, but CEO David Ricks and other insiders together bought nearly $3 million worth of stock in the aftermath of the selloff.

items.headline: Taylor Swift’s last record made up more than 6% of all album sales in 2024. Will ‘The Life of a Showgirl’ do even better?
